com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.json

Class JsonMapper.Builder

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.cfg.MapperBuilder<JsonMapper,JsonMapper.Builder>
      • com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.json.JsonMapper.Builder
  • Enclosing class:
    JsonMapper

    public static class JsonMapper.Builder
extends MapperBuilder<JsonMapper,JsonMapper.Builder>
    Base implementation for "Vanilla" ObjectMapper, used with JSON dataformat backend.
    Since:
    2.10
